summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges for services rendered to Jeffrey E. Epstein Financial Trust Company. It includes shipment details, charges, discounts, and payment information, indicating a total due of $89.87 by June 11, 2003.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is listed as the account holder for the FedEx services detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is identified as the sender of one of the packages shipped via FedEx.

persons.name: Lesley
persons.context: Lesley is mentioned as the sender of another package shipped via FedEx.

events.title: Package Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for shipment.

events.title: Package Delivery
events.description: A package sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein was delivered.

events.title: Package Delivery
events.description: Another package sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein was delivered.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated May 27, 2003, and details charges for FedEx services.
Total charges amount to $89.87, with a payment due date of June 11, 2003.
The invoice includes shipment details for packages sent by Jeffrey E. Epstein, Jeanne Brennan, and Lesley.
Two packages were picked up on May 20 and May 21, 2003, and delivered shortly thereafter.
The document contains a fuel surcharge applied to the shipments.
